document_data.name: ''Lenses of Keen Sight''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Lenses of keen sight''''' were a set of magic lenses from [[Waterdeep]], in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Seemingly ordinary spectacles, ''lenses of keen sight'' were two lenses in silvery metallic frames.
document_data.Powers: ''Lenses of keen sight's'' enchantments allowed the wearer to spot weaknesses in their targets. When the wearer landed a strike on one of these imperfections and weak spots, their damage output was increased.
